original_text: Thus with your mouth ye have boasted against me, and have multiplied your words against me: I have heard them.
korean_text: 너희가 나를 대적하여 입으로 자랑하며 나를 대적하여 여러 가지로 말한 것을 내가 들었노라

sentences.original_text: Thus with your mouth ye have boasted against me
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 너희가 입으로 나를 거만히 말하며

sentences.original_text: and have multiplied your words against me
